attributeName	attributeDefinition	class	unit	dateTimeFormatString	missingValueCode	missingValueCodeExplanation
SiteCode	User or organization-defined code that collects the data to identify the site.	character			NA	Not available
SiteName	Full name of the sampling site.	character			NA	Not available
Latitude	Latitude in decimal degrees.	numeric	degree		NA	Not available
Longitude	Longitude in decimal degrees.	numeric	degree		NA	Not available
LatLongDatumSRSName	The spatial reference system of the latitude and longitude coordinates.	categorical			NA	Not available
Elevation_m	Elevation of the sampling location in meters.	numeric	meter		NA	Not available
VerticalDatum	Vertical datum of the elevation.	character			NA	Not available
LocalX	Local projection X coordinate.	character			NA	Not available
LocalY	Local projection Y coordinate.	character			NA	Not available
LocalProjectionSRSName	Full text name of the spatial reference system of the local coordinates.	categorical			NA	Not available
PosAccuracy_m	Value giving the accuracy with which the positional information is specified in meters.	numeric	meter		NA	Not available
State	Name of state in which the monitoring site is located.	character			NA	Not available
County	Name of county in which monitoring site is located.	character			NA	Not available
Comments	Comments related to the site.	character			NA	Not available
SiteType	The type of site.	categorical			NA	Not available
